title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: Ghosh arrives in Manali and assumes leadership of a team which has been put together to arrest Papaji for Kanak’s murder. Daman hires a lawyer to defend Papaji while Rinku scrambles to put together a plan to thwart Ghosh and a game of cat and mouse ensues. Meanwhile, Teji makes a shocking discovery about someone from her past.
